Key Match Events: Cape Verde scored the first goal in the 17th minute
Ghana tied the game with a goal in the 56th minute
Cape Verde regained the lead with a goal in the 92nd minute
Previous encounter in the 2013 AFCON quarter-finals resulted in a Ghana victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Stade Félix Houphouët-Boigny in Cote d’Ivoire
Cape Verde had a strong start in the tournament with one win and two draws
